p: The frequency profiles of the excitation and refocusing RF pulses in the standard PRESS sequence (Sinc pulse with duration = 2.6 msec, Mao pulse with duration = 6.0 msec 18) and excitation and refocusing Hermite pulses (excitation duration = 2.6 msec, refocusing duration = 3.0 msec) were measured in a silicone oil phantom using a birdcage extremity coil at 7 T, with a spin echo sequence and frequency encoding in the slice‐encoding direction (transversal slab; thickness, 20 mm; field of view [FOV], 400 × 400 mm; TE = 230 msec; TR = 5 sec; bandwidth [BW] = 10 kHz).
